text:
@AndrewYang *2004*, former @WHO DG Dr Gro Brundtland Recommendation to stop future outbreaks of coronavirus & filovirus, incl Close & Ban Wildlife Wet Markets in China.

Dr Margaret Chan & Mr Tedros ignored this

Wildlife Wet Markets in China have reopened

What are you going to do about it?
